channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (15 Apr 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Susanta
item.dc:creator: Susanta
item.description: Thanks for great round up, Nick! Ryan Townley stands out with that fresh and clean design.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for great round up, Nick! Ryan Townley stands out with that fresh and clean design.

item.title: By: Tara Claeys
item.dc:creator: Tara Claeys
item.description: So glad I read this, as I was not on twitter much this week and missed some of these things. I am especially inspired by the HeroPress story from Tonya. Wow. Puts one's problems in perspective to see someone who has actually come back to life. Congratulations to Tonya and thank you Nick and Davinder for including this.
item.content:encoded: So glad I read this, as I was not on twitter much this week and missed some of these things. I am especially inspired by the HeroPress story from Tonya. Wow. Puts one’s problems in perspective to see someone who has actually come back to life. Congratulations to Tonya and thank you Nick and Davinder for including this.

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-04-15/#comment-400">Jon Barratt</a>.
No worries, hope all is good!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jon Barratt.

No worries, hope all is good!

My pleasure, Susan!
And thanks, I certainly wouldn't say no to cake ;)

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description:
Great round up, Nick! Thanks for including me.
Do you have a party planned for the guide's first birthday? I can bring cake!
Have a great weekend!
item.content:encoded:
Great round up, Nick! Thanks for including me.

Do you have a party planned for the guide’s first birthday? I can bring cake!

Have a great weekend!
